channel.title: 🏢 Basque Center for Applied Mathematics (BCAM) on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Basque Center for Applied Mathematics (BCAM) on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: PAC-Bayes-Chernoff bounds for unbounded losses
item.description: New PAC-Bayes oracle bound extends Cramér-Chernoff to unbounded losses, enabling exact parameter optimization and richer assumptions for tighter generalization bounds.
